name: stox
description: StoX GUI - a desktop application for building stox projects

scripts.package-win: tsc && electron-packager . stox --platform win32 --arch x64 --out dist/ --overwrite  --asar --icon=assets/stox_icon.ico
scripts.package-mac: tsc && electron-packager . stox --platform darwin --arch x64 --out dist/ --overwrite
scripts.package-linux: tsc && electron-packager . stox --platform linux --arch x64 --out dist/ --overwrite
scripts.package-and-installer-win: npm run package-win && npm run installer-win
scripts.package-and-installer-sign-win: npm run package-win && npm run signstox && npm run installer-win && npm run signinstaller
scripts.build-frontend: cd frontend && npm install --no-fund && ng build --prod --base-href --aot=true --build--optimizer=true && cd ..
scripts.build-win: npm run build-frontend && npm run package-and-installer-sign-win

author: IMR institute (HI)
